item.title: Innovative Advanced Control of Large Cryogenic Systems
item.description: The ANR CRYOGREEN project gathers collaborative academic and industrial partners, including GIPSA-lab, CEA and CERN. We target to advanced control of large cryogenic systems via explicit nonlinear and hierarchical distributed model predictive control frameworks.
